Reference

Extreme Values

Functions for finding extreme values like peaks/centroids/valleys.

localMaxima()

Local Maxima

refineCentroids()

Refine Peak Centroids

valleys()

Find Peak Valleys

Grouping/Matching

Functions for grouping/matching values.

bin()

Binning

closest() common() join()

Relaxed Value Matching

Similarity

Functions to calculate similarity.

dotproduct()

Calculate the normalized dot product

Noise/Smoothing

Functions for noise estimation and smoothing.

noise()

Noise Estimation

smooth() coefMA() coefWMA() coefSG()

Smoothing

Coerce Functions

Functions for converting objects.

asInteger()

Coerce functions

asRle() asRleDataFrame() asVectorDataFrame()

Tools to reduce memory size of DataFrames

i2index()

Input parameter check for subsetting operations

Helper Functions for Users

Helper functions for the users.

ppm()

PPM - Parts per Million

Check functions
